accounts.name: user
accounts.desc: The authority of wsol_account

accounts.name: wsolFrom
accounts.desc: The wrapped SOL token account to stake wrapped SOL from

accounts.name: destTokenTo
accounts.desc: The liquid staked SOL token account to receive the resulting tokens

accounts.name: wsolBridgeIn
accounts.desc: The PDA that serves as the wSOL account to bridge user's wSOL to SOL. Pubkey::create_with_seed(). base = sol_bridge_out.pubkey, seed = 'wsol_bridge_in'. owner = token_program

accounts.name: solBridgeOut
accounts.desc: The PDA that serves as the system account to bridge user's wSOL to SOL. Seeds = ['sol_bridge_out']

accounts.name: destTokenFeeTokenAccount
accounts.desc: The liquid staked SOL token account collecting fees. PDA. Seeds = ['fee', dest_token_mint.pubkey]

accounts.name: destTokenMint
accounts.desc: The liquid staked SOL mint

accounts.name: wsolMint
accounts.desc: wSOL token mint

accounts.name: user
accounts.desc: The authority of src_token_from. Needs to be mutable to support marinde deposit stake.

accounts.name: srcTokenFrom
accounts.desc: The token account to swap src tokens from

accounts.name: destTokenTo
accounts.desc: The token account to receive dest tokens to

accounts.name: bridgeStake
accounts.desc: The bridge stake account thats withdrawn then deposited. PDA. seeds = ['bridge_stake', user.pubkey, SwapArgs.bridge_stake_seed]. Might be long-lived, make sure the seed is not already in use

accounts.name: destTokenFeeTokenAccount
accounts.desc: The dest_token_mint token account collecting fees. PDA. Seeds = ['fee', dest_token_mint.pubkey]

accounts.name: srcTokenMint
accounts.desc: Input token mint. If this is wrapped SOL, the account can be set to read-only

accounts.name: destTokenMint
accounts.desc: Output token mint. If this is wrapped SOL, the account can be set to read-only

accounts.name: payer
accounts.desc: The person paying for the new fee token account. Can be anyone.

accounts.name: feeTokenAccount
accounts.desc: The self-owned fee token account to be created. Seeds = ['fee', mint_pubkey]

accounts.name: admin
accounts.desc: The authorized program admin

accounts.name: feeTokenAccount
accounts.desc: The self-owned fee token account to close. Must be empty or wrapped SOL. Seeds = ['fee', mint_pubkey]

accounts.name: closeTo
accounts.desc: Refund fee_token_account's rent lamports to here

accounts.name: admin
accounts.desc: The authorized program admin

accounts.name: feeTokenAccount
accounts.desc: The self-owned fee token account to withdraw fees from. Seeds = ['fee', mint_pubkey]

accounts.name: withdrawTo
accounts.desc: Withdraw accumulated fees to here

accounts.name: user
accounts.desc: The withdraw authority of stake_account. Needs to be mutable to support marinade deposit stake.

accounts.name: stakeAccount
accounts.desc: The stake account to deposit

accounts.name: destTokenTo
accounts.desc: The token account to receive dest tokens to

accounts.name: destTokenFeeTokenAccount
accounts.desc: The dest_token_mint token account collecting fees. PDA. Seeds = ['fee', dest_token_mint.pubkey]

accounts.name: destTokenMint
accounts.desc: Output token mint. If this is wrapped SOL, the account can be set to read-only
